function.note: Basic run to map sequences onto a reference assembly

summary.description: PAFScaff is designed for mapping genome assembly scaffolds to a closely-related chromosome-level reference genome assembly. It uses (or runs) Minimap2 to perform an efficient (if rough) all- against-all mapping, then parses the output to assign assembly scaffolds to reference chromosomes.
summary.name: PAFScaff: Pairwise mApping Format reference-based scaffold anchoring and super-scaffolding
